So you wanna know me?

My name is Brentyn Hanna and I'm kinda a freaky lil techno wizard guy.

I graduated in the fall of 2016 from high school with a dual enrollment Liberal Arts associate's degree from Mohave Community College.


From 2016-2018, I pursued a bachelor degree from Arizona State University with a major in Aerospace Engineering and a minor in Astrophysics. I achieved 104 credit hours towards my degree and plan on graduating when it is financially feasible.

I keep my head grounded learning to write sensibly clean code and maintaining efficient hardware with minimal as possible environmental impact. To practice that craft, I started Bigital in 2020, a software company developing initially just frontend websites but these days I'll work on any stack!

In 2022, I accepted a position working for the Federal Government on the Jtech-II contract in Nevada. I was sponsored for a Top Secret clearance and earned a CompTIA Security+ Certification but the real fun i.m.o. was learning and working on live radar threat systems.

In the future, I intend to work on crewed missions with dreams and an ambition to personally participate in space exploration. Regardless, the dream is to work at or closely with NASA or a similar non-profit space or science organization.

Genuinely, thank you for visiting my site!

Novel, alien, or mysterious problems? I would love to help!
